short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track CV submission deadlines with color indicators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An IIT Kharagpur ERP extension that automatically changes colors to track CV submission deadlines. Green denotes an open deadline, while red signifies a closed CV submission. If the extension encounters any issues, simply reload the page.
